title: 7.19: Does Tylenol cause Autism? who gives a shit
body: goofin off on da computer. fuck this class. thog do not care about GWAS.

Making eye contact and nodding my head periodically so that I blend in with the others and hopefully don't get called on. It's the awesome game I pay 80K a year for - I pretend to be interested and he pretends to not notice. whatever social contract me sitting in this room was ever meant to fulfill died years ago with the shortsighted introduction of technology into the classroom. but we play anyway. its all we know how to do. I obey the letter of the law, if not the spirit. it's ok, he seems content enough to listen to himself talk for two hours straight. Only God almighty knows what is going through his head during the awkward silences that grace the room every quarter hour or so. I will say however it was funny to see him dance around the racial implications of Spearman's G factor. I promise you A century ago this man would've absolutely been going across the country giving phrenology lectures on how the negroid contingency's feeble prefrontal cortexes simply can't handle complex tasks like rotating shapes or voting.

Fixed the checklist so its not totally broken. Not sure how I feel about comic sans font but we'll run with it for now. Strong serif for this page though because journaling is a serious matter. ho hum. maybe I am a journalist. I sure as shit ain't a biologist.

24 hrs until Thermo Midterm 1. Panic has not yet set in but the drums in the deep are beginning to rumble. The gobbies are coming. all is not lost yet. remember: Under PN/R all things are possible. See you tomorrow when the storm has passed.

title: First Post
body: hello every1 welcome to da Big show
